channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Nails Inc
channel.desc: A show of hot seasonal colours, classic manicure favourites and unique nail care solutions from Nails Inc.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Summer Ready with Margaret Dabbs
channel.desc: Treat your feet to Margaret Dabbs' incredible formulas, from fabulous foot creams to excellent nailcare. Trust the experts to nail your at-home pedi this season and get your feet ready for summer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: In the Salon with Gatineau
channel.desc: Professional beauty products from the pioneering skincare specialists. Gatineau combines the highest quality plant and marine extracts with the very latest cutting-edge biotechnology.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: New In Beauty
channel.desc: Discover the latest and greatest innovations in beauty as our experts guide you through new and exciting products arriving in the New Year.

channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty
channel.desc: All the highlights and star products.
